issue.title: [C++] Can't build with g++ 5.4.0 on Ubuntu 16.04
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7418](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7418). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*
